articles.author: David Phelan
articles.title: Hot Tub Is 1st iPhone Porn App: Apple Warns Of User Safety In Rare Statement - Forbes
articles.description: It’s almost unheard of for Apple to comment on an individual iPhone app, but it’s just done so in response to the first porn app, just arriving on European iPhones.
articles.content: Apple has been consistent in not allowing pornography into the App Store. But changes in the EU have allowed independent app stores to arrive and these have their own views on whats permissible. So, … [+2344 chars]
